channel.title: Cod: World at War load error
channel.description:
Hello,
Randomly sometimes when I try and load up my saved mission on xbox 360, I get this error:
[code]Error
Save game data is imcompatible with the current version of the game. You may continue from the beginning of your most recent mission or exit to the menus. [/code]
This is so annoying as I am doing it on veteran and I have to start again!!!
Anyone no the problem.
Thanks James

item.title: Cod: World at War load error
item.dc:creator: @Fishstix Fishstix
item.description:
@Fishstix wrote:

I’m pretty sure if you provide the system you’re using and search around a bit you can find a tech site that can help you with this problem, I’ve heard it’s a really well-know error now, so I’m sure you can find the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Cod: World at War load error
